channel.title: Need help? I'm here for you
channel.description:
Sometimes, school can be a huge hastle, and you cannot manage all the things in your life along with 6 assignments due the next day. My goal is to help ease the pressure off of your lives by helping with anything. That could be Algebra, English, Biology, even American Sign Language.
Don't be afraid to ask me the weirdest hypothetical questions, or the dumbest question in the world. I help with everything.
Simply post a question, assignment, or anything else, and I will help with it all I possibly can.

item.title: Need help? I'm here for you
item.dc:creator: @13om13e12 13om13e12
item.description:

i dont undrestand how to use the pascels triangle to get the answer for (2x-y)^6 using the equation (a+b)^n n being how down the pyrimad is and a and b being the x value and y value or something. I missed the day this was taught
-nvm got it done

item.title: Need help? I'm here for you
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:12, topic:11536”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=17151.msg195588#msg195588 date=1156881624]

I belive she lives in south korea.

hah shut up goatee :),
no its ok im over being annoyed, just gonna go with yeah flow…

15 people in one year? Do you go to private school or retard school?

no not retard school, tis private school… anyways heres the story of something boring u dont wanna read:
my school closed down because the bitches who owned the land wanted to make money by selling to land developers so this means maybe 450+ people out of school and onto the streets, you would think hey cool no school for ages, well u’d be wrong, call me weird but i loved that school, it was so different to the previous (6, now 7) schools i had been to.
so anyways got into a grammar school in a town away which means i have to get a train in the morning… that was crap… it was an ok school but it just wasnt my old one… i met my current gf their which is an up point :), then i heard news my old school has taken land lords to court and won, so now we can go back… but so many people had gone to new schools that their is going to be hardly anyone back their… i go back their 11th sept, and i cannot wait

btw if u botherd to read that you are sad.
[/quote]

I’m sad den.

Hmmmm i wasnt trying to insult you…

But nice story and nice ending. :D[/quote]
horrible ending, i dont know when i posted this but ive also just been expelled lol :S

Read full topic

umm just saying but, i thought this was about homework -.- not dating and other stuff lol[br][size=1]Posted at: October 16, 2006, 12:26:26 AM[/size][hr]Well btw guys… just saying have you ever noticed how its so fun to make teachers mad? helpful hints to make them mad…lol
1.ask a stupid question like how do i do addition
2.call her the f word… Works…
3.get that little bubble rap stuff and pop it during class… so fun
4.let it rip in her/him/its face
5.leave class for no reason and go home.
